author: Zack Budryk
title: Pennsylvania governor to issue stay-at-home order for whole state: report
description: Pennsylvania Gov. Tom Wolf (D) will reportedly issue a stay-an-home order for the entire state as the total number of confirmed coronavirus cases there jumps to more than 5,800.A previous stay-at-home order for 33...
content:
Pennsylvania Gov. Tom Wolf (D) will reportedly issue a stay-an-home order for the entire state as the total number of confirmed coronavirus cases there jumps to more than 5,800.
A previous stay-at-home order for 33 counties will be broadened to cover the sta… [+1512 chars]
